Posts.EditableText: Just wanted to let everyone interested to know that this guide works flawlessly: https://www.iis.net/learn/get-started/w ... C301268621 After you've done everything, set up GameFolder in WebPlayerSettings.default.xml, then just launch play.aspx with ?file=filename.quest parameter.
Posts.HTML:
Just wanted to let everyone interested to know that this guide works flawlessly: https://www.iis.net/learn/get-started/w ... C301268621
After you've done everything, set up GameFolder in WebPlayerSettings.default.xml, then just launch play.aspx with ?file=filename.quest parameter.
